response.overview: A full-length screen adaptation of the most powerful and resonant statement in Russian-language music on the topic of the war in Ukraine. Following the concept of the album, Vladi created nine different images, told the stories of nine characters. "February Lasts" is a real acting experience, a live concert in unique and thoughtful locations. Vladi travels inside bunkers and tunnels, trying to find the light in dark times. The filming location is the Furggels structure, essentially a fortress inside a mountain range, built before the World War II to protect Switzerland from Nazi Germany. Before Vladi, the object was almost never used for filming.
response.title: February Lasts
